mapper.insert: insert into recipe (mcode, mno, recipeName, introduce, url, category, portions, view) values(#{mcode}, #{mno}, #{recipeName}, #{introduce}, #{url}, #{category}, #{portions}, 0)
insert into recipe_ingredient (rcode, icode, amount) values(#{rcode}, #{icode}, #{amount})
insert into recipe_order (rcode, orderContent, orderNum, cookingImg) values (#{rcode}, #{orderContent}, #{orderNum}, #{cookingImg})
mapper.select: select type from ingredient where icode = #{icode}
mapper.update: update recipe set mcode = #{mcode}, recipeName = #{recipeName}, introduce = #{introduce}, url = #[url}, category = #{category}, portions = #{portions} where rcode = #{rcode}
mapper.select: select ri.*, i.name, i.type from recipe_ingredient ri join ingredient i on ri.icode = i.icode where rcode = #{rcode}
